meaning: retreat, withdraw, retire, resign, repel, expel, reject

onyomiExamples.meaning: advance or retreat, moving forwards or backwards, movement, course of action, behaviour, conduct, attitude, remaining in one's post or resigning, staying or leaving

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to step back, to move back, to retreat, to withdraw (from the presence of a superior), to leave, to exit, to resign, to retire, to quit, to concede
to repel, to drive away, to repulse, to reject
to move back, to draw back, to recede, to lessen, to subside, to ebb, to go down (e.g. of swelling), to resign, to retire, to quit
to step aside, to move (i.e. out of the way), to make way, to resign, to retire, to quit, to secede

to put something out of the way, to move (something, someone) aside, to remove, to exclude, to take away, to set aside, to keep apart, to remove (someone) from the group, to shun, to do well despite difficulties, to accomplish despite adversity, to do resolutely, to do boldly
